comments.text: This was a very fun Livestream today, Bawkbasoup!
comments.author: @kingshadow8782

comments.text: I like all the RE games except umbrella corps and re verse. Jake and Sherrys campaign was really good in my opinion, Leons was alright too. I would agree RE6 has the best mercenairies in the series in my opinion.
comments.author: @RRedQueen

comments.text: Resident QTE-vil 6 is peak!
comments.author: @brodywise4750

comments.text: I mean Resident Evil 6 sold 17 million copies and had the same director as outbreak 1 and 2  , got rid of the awful tank controls and has the best mercenairies in the franchise. Its nuts bawkbasoup wont play no mercy mercenairies
comments.author: @bilbobaggins6513

comments.text: Bawkbasoup and is a great speedrunner but we never see them speedrunning RE6 or no mercy mercenairies, i think alot of streamers are reluctant because the game is too fast paced and has a steep learning curve
comments.author: @KrausersCastle

comments.text: If RE6 was a single campaign or even two.. I wonder if you all think it would have been substantially improved. It has the stink of a game that was stretched too thin, where the focus was quantity over quality. Everything from the gameplay proficiency to level design to boring assets and atmosphere to a dull hud take away from the experience. Is there a world where the ridiculous tone and over the top nature becomes praised because the elements surrounding it are much more refined?
comments.author: @knleonhart
